level.heading: DESCRIPTION OF THE EMPLOYER- ASSISTED HOUSING PROGRAM (ยง 14-3601)

level.text: The Employer-Assisted Housing Program provides assistance through Downpayment Matching Funds and/or a Deferred Payment Loan (Loan) to eligible Employees, consistent with this chapter.
DHCD shall provide Downpayment Matching Funds towards the purchase of a housing unit by eligible Employees consistent with this Chapter.
DHCD shall provide a Deferred Payment Loan (Loan) toward the purchase of a housing unit by eligible Employees, consistent with this chapter.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 40 DCR 155, 156 (January 8, 1993); as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 49 DCR 9853 (November 1, 2002).
